```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r data}
data <- read.csv("../data/tempRes2.csv")

data$cloneID <- paste(data$Site, data$Leaf, data$Clone, sep="-")

data$Site <- as.factor(data$Site)
data$Leaf <- as.factor(data$Leaf)
data$Treatment <- as.factor(data$Treatment)
data$Clone <- as.factor(data$Clone)
data$cloneID <- as.factor(data$cloneID)
```



```{r growthCurves}
growthGraphData <- data %>%
  group_by(Day, Treatment, Site, Leaf, cloneID) %>%
  summarise(
    avgCount = mean(Count),
    SE = sd(Count)/sqrt(n())
  )

ggplot(growthGraphData, aes(x = Day, y = avgCount, color = Treatment, group = cloneID)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = (avgCount - SE), ymax = (avgCount + SE), width = 0.8)) +
  facet_grid(Site~Treatment)

```
